text: According to their ability, they gave to the treasury for this work 61,000 darics of gold,2:69 Or 61,000 gold drachmas; that is, approximately 1,129.7 pounds or 512.4 kilograms of gold coins 5,000 minas of silver,2:69 5,000 minas is approximately 3.14 tons or 2.85 metric tons of silver. and 100 priestly garments.
